text: BACK TO POLICIES 6. through the energy assessment that the development proposal: Energy offsetting will only be considered as a last resort, and if it can be demonstrated a. does not use fossil fuels on-site for heat or energy; b. has a level of EUI and space heating demand compliant with levels set in Policy CG2; and c. onsite renewable energy generation (e.g. through PVs) has been maximised. d. If all conditions are met, the applicant should establish the shortfall between predicted renewable energy generation to enable the annual renewable energy generation to match the EUI in kWh. The applicant should pay a cash-in-lieu contribution equivalent to generating this energy shortfall. 112 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO POLICIES Supporting text
